file.name: vectorImageFilename
file.description: Input images with 1 scalar value, all the input images should be in the same space (registered). This filter requires at least one image

file.name: labelImageFilename
file.description: Label image filename, this paramtere is required

file.name: frequencyMapFilename
file.description: Lesion frequency map, to constrain the region where lesions can be extracted

integer.name: frequencyMapTreshold
integer.description: Regions that have 'frequencyMapTreshold' or more lesion occurences are considered to be extracted

integer.name: labelValueContains
integer.description: Input label value, the region or label set in labelValue must be in proximity to this label

integer.name: numberOfSamples
integer.description: Set the number of samples to be extracted from the image, -1 for all

double.name: labelValueContainsPercentageMax
double.description: Amount or ration of labelValueContains in the region

integer-vector.name: neighborhood
integer-vector.description: The size of the neighborhood in each dimension
integer-vector.label: Neighborhood Size

integer-vector.name: index
integer-vector.description: Extract a specific neighborhood using this index
integer-vector.label: Index

file.name: outputFileName
file.description: Output FileName used when extracting a single neighborhood from the image (must use --index flat or --refImage )
